title: hehe
content:
That's dirty, Ret. :-)

Scrubs own my soul, so I'm obligated to vote for them. I've just got this thing for wall-crawlers... I love the Zoomers from Metroid, too.

As far as next-gen Keen enemies go, the Babobba is my favorite--I imagine them being soft to the touch, like a sock, and making little squeaky barks. :-P

title: Re: hehe
content:
Shockshund, they are so kyoote ^_^

LL: Oooh! Its electrocuting you KR! It must really like you! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

*Meanwhile...*

Retodon8: OMG Molly! I've loved you ever since I first saw you! OMG OMG OMG!

Molly: *sigh* Another desperate fanboy. You wanna handle this one Lindsey?

Lindsey: What? Look, I covered your 'sleep over' at Dukes mansion? Why should I?

Molly: Hey! I spent all those nights with Eva when you and Jazz were seeing each other, if anything you owe me!

Lindsey: Alright, but hey aint half ugly. Hey, fanboy! I'm going to my castle with a few friends, wanna come?

Retodon8: w00t! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img]

title: Re: What is your favorite Keen creature?
content:
I am in love with Keen's sister now?
I do think I'd be just a little bit too old for her.

So far I've had a positive view on babysitters in general, although of course maybe I was lucky and only met nice ones.
I never really had any babysitters myself when I was young, just a random aunt or acquaintance watching us (2 sisters) a few times that I can recall.
I suppose never having had one tell me what to do might've helped the overall positive view I have. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
I'm sure Molly is cool too.

[quote]Quote:[hr]robo red (to rebuild him for more practical uses)[hr][/quote]

What's more practical than having him autonomously shoot intruders without question?
(Actually I did have a question, and he still tried to shoot me.)Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: What is your favorite Keen creature?
content: There's a lot of great ones to choose from.  But after much deliberation, I have decided upon the foob.  The other creatures may be cute, funny, or just plain awesome, but the foob has one advantage over them all: it is less irritating than any of them!  And maybe it's part of my fetish for cute fluffy things.  In any case, I just think that foobs are very cool in their utter harmlessness, and I would want one as a pet if it didn't combust at the sight of me. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img]
